item.title: Preview LaTeX in Org Mode with Emacs in MacOS
item.description: Using the right Emacs Version #I failed to preview LaTeX with emacs-plus. If you have installed d12frosted/emacs-plus, uninstall it and use emacs-mac. brew tap railwaycat/emacsmacport brew install emacs-mac If you like the fancy spacemacs icon, install it with cask: brew cask install emacs-mac-spacemacs-icon
